text: MariaDB is a free, open source database management system forked from Sun Microsystems' MySQL. It was created by MySQL's software developers, inluding Monty Widenius. They were concerned about Oracle Corporation's acquisition of Sun Microsystems.Conrad Bessant; Darren Oakley; Ian Shadforth, Building Bioinformatics Solutions 2nd Edition (Oxford; New York: Oxford University Press, 2014), p. 50 ==Other websites== * MariaDB Corporation * MariaDB Foundation == References == Category:Databases
title: MariaDB
